name: Pyramid Rush (MikeeyBikeey)
description:
The pyramid is lining up with the eclipse. They must be stopped before they use the power of the eclipse to unleash doom!

Controls

movement: W, A, S, and D

punch: left mouse button

You can flip levers by touching them. You can go to the next level by touching the exit.

History

A jam game made in three days with Gamemaker Studio 1.4. Originally created back in 2017 (Four years ago as of this writing). 

This is the first jam game I have ever created. Not my best work, but I would like others to see how my earlier stuff looks.

Also, the original release had much louder music, sorry. I made sure to turn it down in this version.

Wow, you got to the bottom of the description, good job! Feedback is welcomed.
